verses: Now, thank we all our God,  With hearts and hands and voices!  Who wonderous things have done,  In whom this world rejoices.  Who from our mother's arms,  Has blessed us on our way,  With countless gifts of love,  And still is ours today.

Before our life on earth,  The Lord God knew and loved us.   He freely gave all things,  And more than we knew, gave us.  Therefore we all must join  To sing in unison  The praises of our God;  He is the God of praise.

Oh may this bounteous God,  Through all our lives be near us.  With ever joyful hearts,  And blessed peace to cheer us!  And keep us in His grace,  And guide us when perplexed,  And free us from all ills,  In this world and the next!

All praise and thanks to God,  Who reigns in highest Heaven.  The Father and the Son,  And Spirit now be given.  The one eternal God,  Whom earth and heaven adore,  For thus it was is now,  And shall be evermore!
name: PHB 1
scripture: Psalm 107 vs 8-15; Psalm 95 vs 2; Eph. 1 vs 3-10; Eph. 5 vs 20
author: Martin Rinkart (1586-1649)

verses: Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creation!   O my soul, praise Him, for He is thy health and salvation!   All ye who hear,    Now to His temple draw near;   Praise Him in glad adoration.

Praise to the Lord, who o'er all things so wondrously reigneth,   Shelters thee under His wings, yea, so gently sustaineth!   Hast thou not seen   How thy desires ever been   Granted in what He ordaineth?

Praise to the Lord, who doth prosper thy work and defend thee;   Surely His goodness and mercy here daily attend thee.   Ponder anew   What the Almighty can do,   What the Almighty can do,   If with His love he befriend thee.

Praise to the Lord, who when tempests their warfare are waging,   Who, when the elements madly around thee are raging,   Biddeth the cease,   Turneth their fury to peace,   Whirlwinds and waters assuaging.

Praise to the Lord, who, when darkness of sin is abounding,   Who, when the godless do triumph, all virtue confounding,   Sheddeth His light,   Chaseth the horrors of night,   Saints with His mercy surrounding.

Praise to the Lord, O let all that is in me adore Him!   All that hath life and breadth, come now with praises before Him.   Let the amen   Sound from His people again,   Gladly for aye we aadore Him.
name: PHB 2
author: Joachin Neander (1650-1680)

verses: Sing ye saints, sing to the Savior,   Jehovah is He.   Give Him thanks, and praise Him always,   Praise Him everywhere.   Christians come, your Lord extol,   Magnify His Blessed Name.   Give Him thanks, and praise your   [Savior,    Glorify His Name.

You redeemed ones, blessed children,   Peace you have in Christ.   Joy and peace you have in Jesus,   This God wants for you.   For He loves all the children,   And He cares for them always.   For He guides them, and protects them,   Glorify His Name.

Hosts of evil men may scare you,   Satan's wicked foes.   Saints of Christ, they fear no evil,   In this battle fierce.   For they have the Word of God,   And with faith and prayer they fight.   All equipped with God's own armor,   Victorious they are.

People of God, Israel's children,   Come rejoicing, now.   For the Lord who made and saved you,   Favor He bestows.   Zion's children come with joy,   Be assured that all is well.   For the Lord, the God Almighty,   Sovereign Lord is He.
name: PHB 3
author: Johannes Gottlieb Christaller

verses: If God would give me thousand tongues now, And thousand, thousands more than that; I shall use all to praise Him always, To glorify His Holy Name, And shall extol Him with my heart And glorify His Holy Name.

I shall proclaim His glorious splendors, And share with all, His wondrous works. His fame shall spread in earth and heaven, His righteousness to manifest; My heart and soul shall sing His praise. To magnify His Name abroad.

The forest trees with plants of all kinds, Come forth and praise the Lord your God. You grass and flowers of the fields here, So beautiful the Lord made you; Come forth display His glorious power, Come join the joyful praise of God.

Let all His works join in this worship, Revealing all His glorious works, And tell His splendor and His beauty, The splendor of His Majesty, Lift up your voice His creatures all, Speak of the Glory of the Lord.

We must give praise and thanks to our God, To God the Father of us all; From whom we have our bodies and minds, From whom we have the soul and all. The Lord who made and placed us here. That we may bear much fruit for Him!

Lift high and praise the Name of Jesus, For mercy great we have from Him. He has become our Lord and Savior, lie suffered much and died for us. From death He has delivered us, The Son of God saved us from sin.

All praise and thanks are due the Spirit, God Holy Spirit from on high. He gives to us new life in Jesus, He works to sanctify us all. The fruit of God is from His work, From Him we have a righteous life.

In all my life, you Lord have blessed me, I testify of your great love. In all my troubles and distresses, You Lord my God have been with me. In storms so fearful and so great, I have received your comfort, Lord.

All living creatures praise your Makes, For He provides sustaining grace, For He is just and kind in nature, And hears the cries and prayers of all, To satisfy and save His own,All those who fear His Holy Name.

The Lord preserves all those that love Him, But will destroy the wicked foes. My mouth shall speak His praises always, All saints shall praise Him ever more, For He is Everlasting God, And we shall glorify His Name.
name: PHB 4
scripture: Psalm 107 vs 8-15; Psalm 95 vs 2; Eph. 1 vs 3-10; Eph. 5 vs 20
author: J. Mentzer, (1658-1734)

name: PHB 5
verses: To the Father, I’ll bring  praises,  Vast Your glorious nature is.  You are God of earth and  heaven, Lord who cares for all in  life.  Thy greatness, Thy might,  Oh Father,  Evident in all we see.

God of heaven, Lord  Almighty,  You are God, above all  things.  You created, all things living, By Your Word You made the  world.  And You are the world’s  sustainer,  Wondrous are Your works  Oh Lord.
Omniscient God, You know  all things,  Seasons and all times You  know.  Thousand years of life,  before You, Are like nothing in Your  sight.  You are everlasting  Father,  You remain forever God.

All creation, all living things,  Are from You, and life You  gave.  What can separate us, from  You Lord?    You our God so ever  near.  For Your Spirit dwells with  us Lord,  Life eternal, You have  given.

Lord of earth, and Lord of  heaven,  In You Lord, alone we trust.  May we see You glorious  Father, Worship You with all our  hearts.  Grant that we may love and  serve You.  Grant that we may see Thy  face.

name: PHB 6
verses: My soul shall bless the Lord today,  And all my being praise His Name.  His kindness leads me all the way,  My heart and mouth, tell of His Love.  For He forgives me all my sin,  He heals diseases of mine,  He saves my life from danger,  My soul He frees from death,  He pours His grace upon me,  As eagle, my strength He renews,  Jehovah shall protect His own,  His suffering ones He’ll defend.

The Lord reveals His righteousness,  And takes the side of those oppressed.  And even in the wilderness,  He proved His power to the distressed.  His mercy is forever sure,  His anger is slow and controlled,  He keeps us in His kindness,  His patience is untold,  His grace is high as heaven,  For all those who honor His Name,  Our sin, Jesus has forgiven,  Our sin, He has washed away.

As fathers show compassion here,  For little children they all have,  So God our Lord is merciful,  Towards the people that fear Him.  As fathers show compassion here,  For little children they all have,  So God our Lord is merciful,  Towards the people that fear Him.  He knows our nature and our ways,  He knows that we are dust only.  We are like grass that withers,  Like flowers of the fields;  When scorching winds come over,  They dry up and perish quickly.  So we dry up and perish here,   Both small and the great perish.

God’s love and goodness never fails,  For those that fear His Holy Name.  For those that follow His command,  And walk before Him without blame.  God’s Throne is firm in highest Heav’n,  He rules as a King over all.  You strong and mighty angels,  Who always do God’s Will,  You heav’nly powers come praise Him,  Almighty God servants you are,  And you my soul join in this praise,  And worship the Lord your God.

We all must come and give much thanks,  To God the Father, Son, Spirit.  God’s promises have come to pass,  His blessings we all have received.  Our hope is now in God the Lord,  In Him only we do now trust.  We have become His children,  We must cling to our God,  Our safety is in Jesus,  Secure we are even to death,  In this, we all unite to say,  ‘Hallelujah and  Amen’!

name: PHB 7
verses: Sing with the tongue and  heart and soul,  Sing to our gracious Lord.  Sing of His love and  wondrous works,  And testify of Him.
Lord, you are source of all my  life,  Eternal God, you are.  From you, we have all things  we need,  Good things we need in life.
Lord, we are nothing in this  life,  Nothing we have on earth.  All that we have come from  you Lord,  You made them all for us.
Who made the heav’ns and  made the clouds?  So majestic we see.  Who sends the rain we need  for life?  That waters earth for food?
Security is from the Lord,  In Him we sleep in peace.  The peace too we have in  this land,  Is from you Lord our God.
When In distress, you are so  near,  You gently guide us through.  Your gracious light shines in  our hearts,  You flood our hearts, with  peace.
Foul, all we are so full of sin,  You bear with us in love.  You gently deal with sinful  men,  Our sin you cast away.
To you Oh Lord, I yield my  life,  I trust my life to you.  You’ll take care of all needs I  have,  Gracious and loving God.

name: PHB 8
verses: Sing joyful songs,  O, sing unto God.  The Lord Jehovah,  The Lord who created  and saved all mankind!
The heavn’ly choir,  Of angels of God;  Sing to Jehovah,  Sing to Christ Son of God  who saved all mankind.
God you are kind,  Yes, God you are kind;  You loved us such that,  You gave up your only  Son to save the world.
Give thanks to God,  Oh give Him all thanks.  For He has blessed us,  With Jesus the Savior  who is Christ the Lord.
Praise ye the Lord,  O, praise Christ the King;  For He has saved us,  He paid wages, due for  sin for all mankind
Sing joyful songs,  Let all join to sing;  To Praise the Father,  Praise Son and the Holy  Spirit evermore

name: PHB 9
verses: Let all the world in every  corner sing,  My God and King,  The heavens are not too  high,  His praise may thither fly,The earth is not too low,  His praises there may grow,  Let all the world, in every  corner sing,  ‘My God and King’

Let all the world in every  corner sing,  My God and King,  The Church with psalms  must shout  No door can keep them out  But, above all, the heart  Must bear the longest part  Let all the world in every  corner sing  My God and King!

name: PHB 10
verses: My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God,  My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God,  My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  Bless the Father and bless the  Son of the Lord  Bless the Father and bless the  Son of the Lord, Bless the Father and  bless the Son of the  Lord,  Rise, my soul and  praise the Lord your  God.

My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God,  My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God, My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  Thanks to God the King,  thanks be to God the Son,  Thanks to God the King,  thanks be to God the Son  Thanks to God the  King, thanks be to God  the Son  Rise, my soul and  praise the Lord your  God.

My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God,  My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God,  My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  Adoration be to the Father and  Son,  Adoration be to the Father and  Son, Adoration be to the  Father and Son,  Rise, my soul and  praise the Lord your  God.

My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God,  My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  My soul rise and praise the  Lord your God, My soul rise and praise the  Lord.  Glorify the Father, glorify  Son,  Glorify the Father, glorify  Son, Glorify the Father,  glorify Son,  Rise, my soul and  glorify your Lord.

name: PHB 11
verses: What shall best please you my  Savior.  You the Lord of Hosts and  Might?  Fill me with your Holy Spirit,  Give me this life from you Lord.   For I cannot live as pleasing  Give to you Lord what is  precious.  Thousand times ten thousand  times  I shall ren-der thanks to you.

Lord I know I have denied you  In a life of sin and woe  This has caused me shame  and grief Lord  In your patience, suffering-long  Bearing with me wretched  sinner  Giving freely tender mercies  Thousand times ten thousand  times  I shall render thanks to You

Lord you sought me in my lost  state  And have saved me from such hell  When I was in love with this world,  With desire for evil bread  You came after me to teach me  What is true and worth pursuing  Thousand times ten thousand  times  I shall ren-der thanks to You.

Wondrous ways you act  towards us  To reveal your gracious will  And with agonizing heart pain  You, Oh Lord, search out for us  That we might seek after your  life  Seeking for the gracious Word  Thousand times ten thousand  times  I shall ren-der thanks to You.

Lord your heart is full of love  Love consuming all my life  Love that came through  Christ my Savior  Who my Lord now has  become Gracious Spirit, draw me nearer  And redeem those all around  me  Thousand times ten thousand  times  I shall ren-der thanks to Go  You.

name: PHB 12
verses: Children of Jehovah,  proclaim the Lord’s  Name,  Come worship and  magnify Jesus the Lord.  Come Glorify, honour  and praise the Savior,  The Lord deserves  praise from all He has  saved.
The Lord reigns in  Heaven, eternally  reigns,  But He came to seek  us, He was with us  The Father’s Son Jesus, the vict’ry has won,  He saved us from sin and the chains of the foe.
Therefore we must gather to sing of His praise,  For in Him we all have salvation from sin.  The angels of heaven sing, praising Jesus,  Let Saints here on earth join in praising His name.
We all must now join in the worship of Christ,  Join with the angels above to praise our God.  Come praise Him, adore Him and Honor His Name,  We must all now sing, Hallelujah! Amen

name: PHB 13
verses: Hallelujah, sing to the Lord,  Sing to the Lord with thankful  hearts,  Sing for His wondrous workings.  Forever and forevermore,  We’ll praise our God alone  al-way,Praise, glorify and honor.  Sing all, sing now  Holy, Holy, Holy, Holy,  To the Lord God,  God of hosts, we bless  you ever.

Hallelujah, with joyful hearts,  We give you thanks, the Son of  God,  The Lamb of God, we praise you.  The One in whom we have our  being,  Whose Blood has washed away  our sin,Our Bridegroom, Christ Jesus, Lord.  Holy, blessings,  From Christ Jesus, given to us,  We must give thanks,  With hearts joyful, we praise you  Lord.

Hallelujah, with joyful thanks,  We praise thee, Holy Spirit God.  From whom we all have new  birth.  From whom we have a blessed  faith,  In Jesus our love and  Bridegroom,He comes to make us  ready.  Truly, Heaven,  Is a blissful place to live in,  Manna, have there,  Always sing there,  Hallelujah.

Hallelujah, with joy and thanks,  Sing to the Lord God, ever praise,  And glorify His great Name.  Join with the heavn’ly host above,  With voices loud, come praise His  Name,Come praise Father, Son,  Spirit.  Amen, Amen,  Holy, Holy, Holy, Holy,  God is Holy,  Lord of Hosts is God Jehovah.

name: PHB 14
verses: Jesus savior, Jesus savior  Our Redeemer friend  Thou art Lord our God  forever  You are all our being  Through the Cross you have  blessed us  Blessings, joy now and ever  Praise and honor, praise and  honor  Glory be to Thee

Come revive us, come revive  us  God Almighty come  From our slumber, from our  slumber  In this world of sin   For our hearts are restless,  Lord,  Seeking to worship you now.  To adore you, to adore you  Now and evermore.

name: PHB 15
verses: Praise the Lord, you  heavens, adore Him;  Praise him, angels in  the height;Sun and moon,  rejoice before Him,  Praise him, all your  stars of light.
Praise the Lord! for  He has spoken;  Worlds His mighty  voice obeyed;Laws which never  shall be broken  For their guidance  has He made.
Praise the Lord!  for He is glorious;  Never shall His  promise fail;God has made  His saints  victorious;  Sin and death  shall not prevail.
Praise the God of  our salvation!  Hosts on high, His  power proclaim;Heaven and earth,  and all creation,  Laud and magnify  His name.

name: PHB 16
verses: Jehovah Father, Mighty God, In you we have our lives, With all our soul and flesh  and mind, Your gracious call we hear, Our hearts rejoice in you.
A loving Father, is our God, So heed His gracious call, And let us praise His Holy  Name, Before His presence dwell, Have everlasting peace.
A true savior is Christ the Lord, Jesus, who came from heav’n, He came to save us all  mankind, Christ suffered for our sin, He died to save us all.
And, therefore come now to the  Lord, Give Him thanks, worship Him, Proclaim Him as the Lord of all,  Love Him with all your heart, Salvation He has brought.

name: PHB 17
verses: Sing joyful songs, with praise and thanks,  To God, the loving Father.  For all His wondrous works in us, In Him we have all blessings.  And joy eternal now we have,  In Him, we have such peace in death,  Oh magnify the Father.

The hosts of heaven give thanks to you,  King of all kings, Almighty.  And we on earth join in this praise,  Join to extol the Father.  To praise and glorify the Lord,  The One who made all things so well,  Oh magnify the Father.

All creatures that the Lord has made,  God loves, and He provides for.  His eyes are upon all things He made,  And He sustains all creatures. God’s Kingdom and His subjects too,  And all things in the universe,  Oh Magnify the Father.

In my distress to you I called,  Hear all my supplications.  Deliver me from death Oh Lord,  Save me from death by grace Lord.  So shall I praise the Lord my God,  All join me in this song of praise,  Oh Magnify the Father.

In all my life I’ll praise you Lord,   I’ll glorify you Father.  I’ll spread abroad your Honors too,  Let all creation hear me.  My heart and soul awaken now,  And with my whole being now proclaim,  Oh Magnify the Father.

Come all before the Lord our God,  Come now with joyful worship.   Fulfill your vows before the Lord  And give Him praise eternal.  For God has done all things so well,  And He deserves our praise and thanks,  Oh Magnify the Father.

name: PHB 18
verses: Bless the Lord God Oh my soul,  Praise the Lord and magnify Him.  Earth and heav’n are yours O Lord,  None can comprehend your glory.  You are glorious you change not,  You are everlasting God.
Cherubim and Seraphim,  Sing your praises without ceasing.  Host of angels too in Heav’n,  Glorify and honor your Name.  They unite to sing always,  Holy, Holy, Holy Lord.
Prophets too of old you sent,  And the Saints already with you;   All together magnify, Glorify your Name and honor.  All the Saints here join the throng,  Give you thanks and worship you.

We here on earth join this song,  Strong, weak, young and old we come now.  Praise the Lord and worship Him,  Give to Him the glory due Him.  Lord, your holy Church on earth,  Give you praise and worship you.
Gracious Father in your love,  You did give to us Christ Jesus.   You have saved us by His life,  You have made Him King forever.  By your Holy Spirit, Lord  We are now made Saints in you.
Gracious Father, keep us still,  Jesus Christ, have mercy on us.  Gracious Spirit cleanse us now,  Guide us in the heav’nly way Lord.  When we see you Lord in Heav’n,  We shall praise you ever more.

name: PHB 19
verses: We glorify you Lord,  We thank you O our God,  Almighty God, Creator,  Creation You adore,  Angels and hosts of Heav’n,  Laud You and praise Your Name,   Cherubim, Seraphim,  Are singing joyfully,  “O Holy, Holy  Lord  O Holy, Holy Lord,  Jehovah, Mighty God  We worship. You O Lord”.

Elders before the Throne,  You Mighty ones of God,  Angels on guard duties,  Flaming fires and all,  The glorious saints in Heav’n,  And all to follow on,  Shall praise the Father, Son,  God Holy Spirit, praise,  Glory to God on High  Glory to God in full,  In unison we sing,  All sing God’s glory now.

Christ Jesus Son of God,  The Savior of mankind!  You are the Lord Great King,  We all praise You, O Christ.  With Father, You are One,  His glory You reflect, You were so meek, humble,  You came in human flesh.  Death suffered, You arose.  To Heaven ascended  Glorified and honored,  On Father’s Throne you sit.

For us You came to earth,  You came to save us all,  Bought us with precious Blood;  Reconciled us to God!   The curse You took away,  You shall bring us to Heav’n,   We plead with You and pray,  Save us from worldly sin,  Lord, take away our sin,  Defeat the foe for us.  Be with your Saints, O Lord,  Grant us eternal peace.

To Jehovah our God,  To You we bring our praise,  Our Father God we praise.  We glorify Your Name.  Holy Spirit we praise,  Spirit Holy You are.  Our hope is in You, Spirit,  Have mercy on all Saints.  Grace, give us to live here,  To overcome all sin,  Be with us Spirit, Lord,  Complete Your work, Amen.

name: PHB 20
verses: Come now my soul and praise the Lord Jehovah,  Praise God always, till my life shall end.  Come praise the Lord Jehovah, God Almighty,  Let all your being praise Him always.  From whom we have such wonderful life,  Come worship Him, come sing with me always,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

Trust not in kings, for flesh they are such only,  They shall return to dust as all men.  Wisdom of man and plans of all men mighty,  All such shall perish soon in the grave.   Put not ever your trust in any man,  Trust in the Lord, who is Almighty God,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

Happy the man, whose help is God of Jacob,  Who hopes in God who is Lord of all.  Faithful is He, the Lord of grace and justice,  Blessed is he who trusts in this God.  In Him you have all wisdom and all strength,  In Him alone you have all that you need,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

Creator of the earth and of all heaven,  Who made the seas and who made all things.  His word shall stand forever and forever,  His promises shall stand so secure.  This God Almighty the all sovereign Lord,  The Faithful Jehovah, the Holy God,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

Injustice, Lord you hate and you stand for right,  Oppressed ones you defend and protect.  In times of famine, God shall still provide food,  All that you need, the Lord shall provide.  In God, the prisoner shall be free indeed,  Bowels of mercy we have in Jesus,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

Eyes of the blind the Lord God shall soon open,  Humble and meek, the Lord shall raise up.  All those that trust the Lord and have faith in Him,  The Lord shall always show them His love.   All strangers, widows and orphans, listen,  Almighty God shall provide all your needs;   Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

All who forget the Lord and forsake Jesus,  The Lord shall leave them to their own ways.  That they may suffer for their sin and actions,  The folly of their life all shall see.  The Lord God is the King for evermore,  Zion the Lord shall bless now and always,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

Come all you Saints and praise the Lord Jehovah,  Wondrous His works we shall always see.  All those that have the Spirit shall say, “Amen”!  Come let us sing praise and thank the Lord.  All children of the Lord come now and sing,  Praise God the Father, Son and Holy Ghost,  Hallelujah, Hallelujah.

name: PHB 21
verses: All people that on this earth  dwell, Come now with joyful praise. Come praise the Lord of Host  in heav’n Eternal praise all give.
All people wake from sleep and  sing, Sing to the Lord of Hosts. The Lord who acts so  wondrously, Great, awesome are His  works.works.
The God who is with us from  birth, Strength from Him we all have. When we are perishing in life, He is present to save.
The Lord we so much grieved  by sin, Patient He was with us. He pardoned all our sin and  wrong, Forgave and blessed us all.
We seek His blessings for our  land, His peace we need in life. The work we do is blessed by  Him, Prosperity He gives.
Lord, now we pray, grant us  your grace, Lord, be with us always. Lord, save us from all troubles  here, Lord, come deliver us.
So long as we live here on  earth, Your presence we shall seek. When death is near and we  depart, Remain with us and bless..
When we are troubled and  distressed, Open our eyes to see. Your countenance grant us to  see, Be with us in your Home.

name: PHB 22
verses: Praise, my soul, the  King of heaven,  To His feet thy tribute  bring;  Ransomed, healed,  restored, forgiven,Who like me, His praise  should sing?  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise the everlasting  King.

Praise him for His grace  and favor  To our fathers in  distress;  Praise him still the same  for ever,Slow to chide, and swift  to bless;  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise Him, praise Him,  Glorious in His  faithfulness.

Father-like, He tends  and spares us;  Well our feeble frame he  knows;  In His hands He gently  bears us,Rescues us from all our  foes;  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise Him, praise Him,  Widely as His mercy  flows.

Frail as summer's flow'r  we flourish,  Blows the wind and it is  gone;  But while mortals rise  and perish,God endures  unchanging on.  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise the High Eternal  One.

Angels, help us to adore  Him;  Ye behold Him face to  face;  Sun and moon, bow  down before Him,Dwellers all in time and  space.  Praise Him, praise Him,  Praise him, praise him,  Praise with us the God  of grace.

name: PHB 23
verses: King of glory, King of  peace  I will love Thee;  And that love may never  cease  I will move Thee.  Thou hast granted my  request  Thou hast heard me;  Thou didst note my  working breast  Thou hast spared me.

Wherefore with my utmost  art  I will sing Thee;  And the cream of all my  heart  I will bring Thee.  Though my sins against  me cried  Thou didst clear me;  And alone, when they  replied  Thou didst hear me.

Seven whole days, not  one in seven  I will praise Thee;  In my heart, though not in  Heav’n  I can praise Thee.  Small it is, in this poor  sort  To enroll Thee:  E'en eternity's too short  To extol Thee.

name: PHB 24
verses: We now glorify the Lord, And extol and praise His  Name. For His love is ever sure, Bountiful His mercies are.
Soul and spirit, life and all, These we have as gift  from God. Gracious mercies from the  Lord, We receive from Him  always.
He gives bread the body  needs, He provides the soul its  needs. But sin has ruined all our  lives, And we are all faced with  death
But we have a Savior now, Savior of the world from  sin; Jesus Christ who died for  all, Redeeming God’s chosen  ones.
His Word and His baptism, Have become the Food we  need; Holy Spirit God gives us, By faith in God we are  blessed.
Forgiveness of sin we  have, And eternal life in Christ, All the promises of God, Great thing we shall have  in Heav’n.
Lord, your love we seek to  have, Be with us and bless us Lord. Bless the great and small in  life; You are gracious, loving God
Consecrate us in the Truth, Grant us freedom from  above. Lord we seek your glory now; In the Name of Christ, Amen

name: PHB 25
verses: I’ll praise you Oh my Lord, You are my light and life  Lord. Creator of my soul, From you I have my nature.Father, who knew my life, Before the womb I dwelt, To me your blessings  give, Now and forever more!

I’ll praise you Oh my Lord, You Lord my God and  Savior. The Only Son of God, You gave your life to save  me.Your Blood was shed for  me, The Blood that washed me  clean, From all unrighteousness, This Blood protecteth me.

I’ll praise you Oh my Lord, And you God, you are my  Light. The Holy Spirit God, You come to me from  Jesus.Comfort me Spirit God, My counselor in life, Strengthen Oh Lord my  faith, Be always with me Lord.

I’ll praise you Oh my Lord, Praise to my Lord and God  give. You are One only God, In Father, Son, the Spirit.The Saints in Heav’n above, And all believers here, Are praising you Oh Lord, Your Holy Name we praise

name: PHB 26
verses: Come praise the Lord, sing Hallelujah, Come praise Jehovah in the heav'n. All angels and God's hosts in heaven, Come with your praise and worship God. Come sun and moon, and sing your praises, Join in the praise, you stars of heav'n. Praise Him, the highest heav'n, sing praises, You waters above, praise His Name.

All creatures come to praise Christ Jesus, For at His Word, all things were made. He is the way that leads to heaven, The Way and Truth, none shall be lost. Then come all creatures that are on earth, Join in the praise and laud His Name. That all below and all in Heaven, Unite to praise the Lord Most High.

Let fire and snow, and hail and the frost, Come bring their praise to Christ our Lord. Come stormy winds, all hills and mountains, Come fruit trees and all cedar trees. Come creeping things, come birds in the skies, Come kings on earth and princes all, Young men and maidens, children, aged, Come praise the Lord who made all things.

Let all things praise the Lord Jehovah, His Name, alone, is exalted. His glory is above the heavens, He raised a horn for those He loves. He causes praise for all His saints here, He causes praise for His chosen. Let all those who are near to Jesus, Come shouting praise to God on High.

name: PHB 27
verses: Triune, Trinity, Father, Son, Spirit, All the hosts on High  sing your praise.Grant that songs we sing  here, Songs of your redeemed  ones, We come before your throne  O Lord.
God who is gracious, You are merciful, Grant us Lord, O Thy  Word to hear.Seek, now your lost  children, Rescue and save us Lord, For-give us, all our sins O  Lord!
We thank you, Father, We praise Jehovah, Glory, be to Thy Name,  dear Lord.Let Thy Kingdom come  Lord, Come to all nations Lord, Listen, dear Lord, we pray  Amen.

name: PHB 28
verses: Our suffering Lord, merciful  Father, Your love is great, eternal  Love. I come with host of other  sinners,Come praising you, and  worship you. We thank you Lord, for  Savior Christ, Eternal One you are our  God. X2

I’ll praise you for what Jesus  did here, He died to save this sinful  world. He made atonement for all  sinners,Forgave us and reconciled  us. His Word is truth and life and  light, His glory He has shared with  us. X2

We have your joyful  promises Lord, Your glory Lord, we sinners  see. What then shall separate us  from you Lord?Your covenant is True and  sure. Heaven and earth shall pass  away, Faithful you shall remain  always. X2

We have received the grace  we need here, The grace you promised in  your Word. God deepen faith and trust in  Jesus,Help us to trust you only  Lord. I’ll praise you now and  evermore, Gracious you are, our faithful  God. X2

Our heart and tongue must  offer praises, With all in us, we worship  you. Grant grace that we may not  forsake you,Lord, keep our hearts steadfast  in you. May we be faithful servants Lord, Keep us close by You in this life.  X2

When Satan comes with  lustful cravings, Harass me in this sinful  world. Clothe me with armor to  protect me,The darts of evil shall not  hurt. Lord multiply your grace to  me, Grant me foundation strong  in You. X2

Remind us of your gracious  mercies, And of your love that saved  the world. The grace that sought us and  that found us,Is grace of God that comforts  us. All gifts we have from you to  serve, By faith in Christ, we have  them all. X2

All these confirm us as your  children, Beloved children of you Lord. Great honor you bestowed  on us all,In Jesus Christ, we are so  blessed. Sinners you gave to Christ to  save them, I am one such that you did save.  X2

I am so blessed by grace  from Jesus, I have become an heir of  God. I once was such a shameful  sinner,You took my place and died  for me. Great gift I have from you,  Lord Jesus, Your Word and great  salvation, mine. X2

name: PHB 29
verses: Worthy the Lamb that was  slain, To receive honor and glory; Host of angels sing this song,What must we do for the  Lord God? All redeemed by Jesus  Christ, Join to praise the Lamb of  God.
Lamb of God was slain for  us, It was sin from us that slayed  Him. Should we yield to sin again?That which caused the death  of Jesus? Let us cast all sin away, And put on Christ’s  righteousness.
To you Lord I yield my heart, Jesus, take this life that you  gave. Lord, receive and bless this  life,All I have I give to Jesus. What I render, as worship, Is my life that you  redeemed.

name: PHB 30
verses: Glory be to God, The Creator of the world in  Love, Great provider, sustainer the  Lord, Glory be to Him,Infinite His wisdom is, Omnipotent is our God, Come praise the Lord  of all Hosts (repeat)

Praise Jehovah God, He did make all things so  beautiful, In His knowledge, love, He  made all things, We must praise the Lord,None was there to help the  Lord, When the universe He made, Come praise the Name of the  Lord (repeat).

God, Almighty Lord, Omnipotent, Omnipresent  God, Idols all are creatures, when  compared, With Almighty God,Come ye people of this  world, Come and glorify the Lord, He is worthy, of our Praise  (repeat).

name: PHB 31
verses: God, who made the  earth,  The air, the sky, the sea,  Who gave the light its  birth,  Careth for me.
God, who made the grass,  The flow’r, the fruit, the  tree,  The day and night to  pass,  Careth for me
God, who made the sun,  The moon, the stars, is  He  Who, when life’s clouds  come on,  Careth for me
God, who made all  things,  On earth, in air, in sea,  Who if I lean on Him,  Careth for me.
When in Heav’n’s bright  land  I all His loved ones see,  I’ll sing with that blest  band,  Careth for me.
God who gave His Son, Jesus who died for me, Help me to lean on you, You’ll care for me.

name: PHB 32
verses: Earth and heav’n and all  therein Glorify the Lord and praise, Come my soul your treasure  bring, To reveal God’s glory now.
See the sun and moon and  stars, How their splendors fill the  skies. To reveal God’s glory bright, Day and night they praise His  Name. EH 32
So the beauty of the earth, Majestic in wondrous life; Beauty from its teeming  life, Glorifies the Lord our God!
Birds of air too sing your praise, Rivers, seas and springs and  lakes; Lightening, thunder, earthquake,  storms, All reveal the power of God.
Wonderful, you are my God As I ponder all your works. Show me now your glory  Lord, Lord of love, I worship you.

name: PHB 33
verses: Wonderful is our God the  Father, None can compare with  Him in glory, You are so mighty,  majestic.Radiantly bright you shine  with splendor, The Light is robe for you  our Father, You wear as garment  glorious light.You have in power  made all the heavens, The sun and moon  and stars you made.Your glorious  throne is set in  Heaven, No eye has seen  your glorious being.

In the beginning, you made  all things, Heaven and earth you Lord  created, The earth you caused to be  apart.The earth was  covered with much  water, The waters rose  above the mountains,The Spirit moved over  waters. The waters you caused to  be gathered, The waters were apart from  land,Mountains  appeared, the land  was seen, The waters gathered  as the Sea.

You cause the rain to form  above us, You send the rain from  clouds above us, With winds you send the  rain to us.Lightening with  thunderstorms, the rain  comes, The rain descends from  clouds above us,The falling rain is sent from  you. The winds are like your  angels coming, The lightening is like servant  sent,They come revealing,  Lord your power, Your greatness, see  with fear of you.

The rain from God refreshes  all things, It causes plants to grow to  bear fruit, By it the grass grows on this  earth.We are so blessed  with food for feeding, Food also for the  flocks we raise here,By it we feed all animals. Birds of the earth have  trees and branches, Where they reside for rest  on earth,With pleasant songs,  they all sing aloud, They sing in joy in  praise of God.

In this life, Lord I’ll always  praise you, In all my life, I’ll praise my  Maker, I shall give thanks and  glorify.All people come and  praise the Lord, Come join to sing and  praise the Maker,The Lord is worthy of all  praise. Sinners shall not have life  forever, They shall too soon perish in  lifeThe righteous shall  love God their Lord, They shall rejoice in  God their Lord.

name: PHB 34
verses: When we see the glorious  splendor, Of this earth and of its stores; We are pleased with wondrous  beauty, Beauty in what God has made.
But this earth and all its  glories, Are all nothing in God’s sight Earth is but a tiny part of, All, the universe God made.
See the sun and all its beauty, Moon and stars He made them  all, For our needs and for His glory, Therefore have delight in God.
But the beauty of the Lord  God, Glorious is and majestic. Far exceeds all beauty in life, Beauty of this world exceeds.
Heart of God the Lord  creator, Is so full of gracious love. O how glorious God Himself  is, Beauty of His face we’ll see.

name: PHB 35
verses: Behold the stars in heav’n  above, Infinity they must be. They shine with brightness in  the skies, None can explore them all.
So tiny we all here appear, So tiny we are to Him. The Lord is big who made all  things, And who sustains the world.
The Lord Almighty Jehovah, Cares for the world that He  made! Creatures so small and tiny  all, He cares for everything
He sent His own beloved  Son, He loved the world so  much He laid His life for us, And saved the great and  small alike

name: PHB 36
verses: Ancient of Days, the  Wondrous God, We are before Thy Throne. We plead for mercy, gracious  Lord, Triune God, we have come.
Before the Universe was  made, Before all seasons came, You dwelt in glorious  majesty, You dwelt in love and peace.
Eternal God, you have no  end, God you are evermore. You dwell in all and fill all life, Eternal Lord Thou art.
All things so wondrously you  made, All things you made and  blessed. Your glory and your majesty, Exceed all beauty see.
Merciful, gracious, loving  God, To you, Oh Lord I come. I come with praises in my  heart, I praise and worship you.
Ancient of Days, the  Wondrous God, We are before Thy Throne. Have mercy, look upon us  Lord, Triune God, we have come.

name: PHB 37
verses: Our faith is in the Lord our God, Creator, God of earth and  heav’n. He is our Father, God in heav’n, We are His childrennow by grace. The God who saves us from all  sin, And sanctifies our soul and  being, He is the Lord in all for all.

Our faith is in Christ, Son of God, In Jesus Christ, we all believe. He is with God the Lord of Hosts, And always withthe Mighty God! He was conceived by Holy  Ghost, Born of the Virgin Mary blessed, Flesh He became, like  humankind.

He suffered much here on  this earth, Was crucified and died at  last. Jesus was buried in a tomb, His soul descendedinto hell. But on the third day He arose, And He ascended into heav’n, From there, He shall come  back again.

In God the Holy Spirit, Lord, We all believe and confess  now. He is the God the Comforter, In Him, we haveall gifts from God. The Holy Cath’lic Church we  are, Forgiven, we shall rise again, Eternal life we all shall have.

name: PHB 38
verses: In God the Father I delight, He is the Lord of earth and  heav’n, He is my all and all here. My gracious Father who  provides, All that I needhere in this life, He is my light in darkness. When in trouble, when in  distress, I have no joy, none can help me, Love of God is comfort for me.

In God the Son is my delight, In Jesus Christ my Lord and  God, The Way, the Truth, the Life is. He heals the disease of my soul, In Him I havebecome so rich, He makes me safe in danger. In Him, I have, great salvation, From all my sin; He is savior. Only savior of mankind is.

In God the Spirit, I delight, He is the Holy Spirit Lord, The One was sent by Jesus. He is the One that teaches  Truth, He is theComforter for us, He is our source of all Strength. Knowledge, wisdom and  discernment, With truth and all righteousness  here, Gracious Holy Spirit, gives us.

name: PHB 39
verses: Holy, Holy, Holy! Lord  God Almighty!  Early in the morning  our song shall rise to  Thee;Holy, Holy, Holy!  Merciful and Mighty!  God in Three  Persons, blessed  Trinity!
Holy, Holy, Holy! all the  saints adore Thee,  Casting down their  golden crowns around  the glassy sea;Cherubim and  Seraphim falling  down before Thee,  Which wert, and art,  and evermore shalt
Holy, Holy, Holy!  though the darkness  hide Thee,  Though the eye of sinful  man Thy glory may not  see:Only Thou art holy,  there is none beside  Thee,  Perfect in power, in  love, and purity.
Holy, Holy, Holy! Lord  God Almighty!  All Thy works shall  praise thy name in  earth and sky and sea;Holy, Holy, Holy!  Merciful and Mighty!  God in Three Persons  blessed Trinity!

name: PHB 40
verses: Glory be to God the  Father,  Glory be to God the Son,  Glory be to God the  Spirit,Great Jehovah, Three  in One!  Glory, glory, glory,  glory,  While eternal ages run!
Glory be to Him Who loved  us,  Washed us from each spot  and stain!  Glory be to Him Who bought  us,Made us kings with Him  to reign!  Glory, glory, glory, glory,  To the Lamb that once  was slain!
Glory to the King of  angels,  Glory to the church’s King,  Glory to the King of  nations!Heav’n and earth, your  praises bring;  Glory, glory, glory, glory,  To the King of glory  bring!
Glory, blessing, praise  eternal!  Thus the choir of angels  sings;  “Honor, riches, power,  dominion!”Thus its praise creation  brings;  Glory, glory, glory, glory,  Glory to the King of  kings!

name: PHB 41
verses: Father of heaven, whose love  profound  A ransom for our souls has  found,  Before your throne we sinners  bend,  To us your pardoning love  extend.
Almighty Son, incarnate Word,  Our Prophet, Priest, Redeemer,  Lord,  Before your throne we sinners  bend,  To us your saving grace  extend.
Eternal Spirit, by whose breath  Our souls are raised from sin  and death,  Before your throne we sinners  bend,  To us your quickening power  extend.
Jehovah Father, Spirit, Son -  Mysterious Godhead, Three in  One,  Before your throne we sinners  bend,  Grace, pardon, life to us  extend.

name: PHB 42
verses: All glory be to God on  High, Peace upon earth,  goodwill to men. His gracious mercies loveprofound, He pours upon His  children now. God’s  favor is upon His own,Peace from Him now  and evermore. God has reconciled  man with Him.

We give to God His  glory due, We give Him praise we  thank Him now. Forever andforever more, You are the God, the  Lord of all. Almighty  God, the sovereign  Lord,To whom all  creatures shall repair, A safe abode in you  we have.

Jesus the Lord the Son of  God, Eternal One, you are the  Lord. Redeemer of the world from  sinYour precious Blood  was shed for us. The  Lamb of God was  slain for us,The Lord our God,  our Savior dear, Have mercy on us all  we plead.

Descend O Spirit, come to  us, Dwell in our hearts, come  comfort us. Bring us togetherHoly One, Shine in our hearts the  light of God. Destroy all  evil work in us,Deliver us from all our  foes, We praise you Lord  forever more.

name: PHB 43
verses: Holy ,Triune God, We acknowledge  Thee. We declare you as  our Savior,In the Body of Christ  Jesus, And His death for us, On the Cross He  died.
Angels sing your  praise, Seraphim, too sing. We desire to join this  worship,Of you Father, Son and  Spirit, Singing songs of praise, To you Lamb of God.

name: PHB 44
verses: Sing in praise of God, who loves  us, Sing of God’s eternal love. Come to Him, all you God’s  chosen, Come and praise His Holy  Name.For this God is fearful also, And His wrath no one can  stand. But He shows His love for all  men, Therefore, glorify His Name.

God revealed His Love in  Jesus, In Jesus we see God’s love. None can fathom this love in  Christ, None can understand such  love.None but God the Holy Spirit, God the Spirit now has  come. He will teach us all things of  God, He will help us in our faith.

Wide and high and big is His  love, Love beyond the universe. Steadfast love that is  enduring, Love, O Love, abiding love.Love that fills the highest  heavens, Deep and wide and full and free, Love that dwells in God’s heart  only, His full Heart He gives to us.

Wondrous love, I cannot  measure, I believe in this great Love. Jesus loves me, Satan hates  me, Evil forces me, assail.Jesus love me now and  ever, Help me to love you in turn, I shall sing Thy praises  ever, To you pleasant love I’ll

name: PHB 45
verses: Good portion I have in the Lord, Who made all things we have on  earth. He cares for me, my gracious  God, To Him I yield my life, my all.
He is my life and salvation, My Rock and fortress is the  Lord. My strength and helper in this  life, On Him I must depend in life.
The Lord says to all that know  Him, All that, belong and trust in  Him. “Call on me in the trouble day, And I will come deliver you”.
The Lord shall save you from  distress, And He will glorify His own. Life in all fullness He will give, With great salvation, He will  bless.
Great is the Name of Jehovah, Great is the praise your Name  deserves. Grant nations to acknowledge  you, Bring them into your Kingdom,  Lord.

name: PHB 46
verses: All power belongs to God Most  High, Let all come bow down to Him. Who can compare with God the  Lord? His glory nonecan compare. His name and works so  wonderful, Praise Him and glorify His  Name. Laud Him and honor His Name.

His knowledge and His  wisdom vast, God’s worth is  unsearchable. His ways are all inscrutable, His judgmentswondrous they are. Who can fathom the mind of  God? Who can counsel the Lord  Most High? There is no one beside God.

Our God is great, He fills the  world, The earth serves as His  footstool. Glorious the Light around His  Throne, And this Light nonecan approach. This God has now revealed  Himself, Mankind can now behold His  works, The work He did to save us.

This God is so far but so near, He knows His own and calls  them. He sees all things; no one can  hide. He sees us allnone can hide. Darkness is light to Him the  Lord. The midnight is as bright as  day, There is no darkness in Him.

The earth and heavens, the  Lord sustains, In Him all keep their places. His powerful wings, He  spreads around, He covers allHis children. How glorious is the sight of  God, His gracious mercies all  abound, He keeps us safe in His love.

Our Holy God, the righteous  God, His splendor shines so brightly. All those that taste the love of  God, They shall beblessed with His peace. They shall have everlasting life, And they shall have eternal joy, These none can share with  others.

The Heavn’ly Father of mankind, Deserves all praise and all  thanks; The angels bow and worship  Him, Join with usin this worship. All power belongs to Lord our  God, Is any man like Jesus Christ? Let all on earth adore Him.

name: PHB 47
verses: Lord our God, the great Jehovah, Our sinful eyes cannot behold  you, Yet you are close and near to us. None can think your thoughts, O  Father, You are so great and fill the  whole world,You are the Lord of all in all. You are the Lord the God, Alpha and Omega, Everlasting, Your greatness none can  comprehend; Our knowledge is so small,  compared.

The clouds from a seat for you  Lord, The earth is like to you a  footstool, We are so small, compared with  you. What the Seraphim consider, The human knowledge can’tIn you is found all knowledge  Lord. Midnight and Day are same to  you, Darkness and light alike, Are same before you Lord, There is no darkness in you O  Lord,

Everlasting King, Jehovah, The universe you made, so mighty, All things we see display your  power. Earth and heaven you made in  beauty,You are the King of this whole world. In you is found knowledge. Righteous judgments you have, You are perfect. You are so pure, your thoughts are  right, The everlasting God you are.

God of love, and God of mercy, The God of Truth, the God of glory, Resplendent are your attributes. You are bountiful in mercy, Such mercy we experience daily,Merciful you are always Lord. Adam’s race you do help, You help the small and great, You care for us. Wonderful God, you know our needs, Lord, grant us grace to love you more.

Be my Father, Lord Jehovah, Your child Lord, I desire to be now, I seek to love you only Lord. All things here shall soon be no  more, The Lord shall burn all that we seeThe Lord shall save His people then. You are our refuge Lord, The savior of the world, Hallelujah. I long to see and praise you Lord, And glorify and worship you.

name: PHB 48
verses: The Lord is good glorious is  His worship, The Father adopts us all  now, His children. He loves us all with such a  gracious love,His love is banner over  us, His children. In this we have great  courage in the Lord. The Lord is good.

The Lord is good, He so  much loves His own, He chastises and shapes us  to be like Him. The Lord is slow to anger  and punish,When we are weak, He  strengthens us, He heals us. Because of Jesus, God has  loved us much. The Lord is good.

The Lord is good, He is  compassionate, He is the fountain of life in  Him we live. He seeks for us He does  care for us all,He seeks that we hear His  own Word, the Gospel. Which god is there that  love his people thus. The Lord is good

The Lord is good, yes our  God is so good, In His bosom we all do rest,  forever. By death the Lord brings to  end all suffering,That He may receive His own  into His peace. Our Rest in Him shall be a  rest so sweet. The Lord is good.

The Lord is good, we must bring  thanksgiving, Come worship Him, praise His  Name now and bow to Him. Come honor and come to glorify  God,Come praise the Son and  Holy Ghost, praise the Lord. Come praise the Lord for all  His goodness here. The Lord is good.

name: PHB 49
verses: Our God is True and Faithful  Father, He’ll not forsake His children  here. God will employ sorrow or  pleasure,To keep His children in His  will. The hopeless and the lost  have hope now, God has provided Savior for  all men.

Our God is True and  Faithful Father, He holds and cherishes His  own. He will not leave His own  to perish,He comforts them and  soothes their pain, And when we fear the wicked  forces, With His own strength, God  will protect His own.

Our God is True and Faithful  Father, He makes us friends with  Him in Christ. I am convinced of God’s  salvation,He’ll save me from the  enemy. When I am tempted and  discouraged, His covenant love shall  renew my strength.

Our God is True and  Faithful Father His promises are all so  sure.He guides me by His  light as pilgrim,I shall not stray from His safe  paths. His Word is True, the food I  need now, I shall have joy by keeping to  His Word.

Our God is True, and  Faithful Father, I seek to be a faithful  child. Corruption of the flesh is  much here,Lord, save me from this  dreadful scourge. Help me to cling to you, dear  Jesus, Give me your peace to live  here on this earth.

name: PHB 50
verses: Jehovah, God, The Lord Almighty, praise  Him. Omnipotent, Almighty God I know Him, I’ll praise His glorious Name  on earth.
What God desires, He does and that endureth, All things He made, He sustains all He made here, That they may not perish in  life.
Holy is God, There is no sin in Lord  God, He is the Head, All things are subject to  Him, His Throne is everlasting.
The Lord is God, He is sufficient Lord God, He is so full, With love and grace and  mercy, All things are possible with  Him.
What is in heav’n, And what we find on this  earth, He knows all things, He is Omniscient Lord  God, All things are visible to
God is with me, He keeps my heart at peace  here, He is with me, The Lord protects me always, His gracious Hand holds me  through life.
The Lord is near, He searches me and knows  me, He knows me well, My goings out and comings, My ways in life, He fully  knows.
When I ascend, To heav’n the Lord is  found there, When I descend to death  he is there also, You Lord are everywhere  in life.

My mind God knows,
My troubles are no barrier,
He hears my cries; He is ready to help me,
His eyes are always on me here.
Nothing I have, Nothing belongs to me here, All things I have, they come from God the maker, Then I shall glorify His Name.
God does all things, How beautiful His works arc, Sun, moon, stars, wind, they all reflect His beauty, His wondrous works I must declare.
Clouds, seas, forests, The grass and all we see here, Great mountains, deserts and all things here praise You; Your greatness all things here reveal.
Creatures on earth, All beasts and plants and flowers, Cotton, feathers, and all things light in weight here, Reveal your wisdom and your power.
The rain you give, It waters land and gives growth. Yam, corn, plantains, we have as blessings from you, The meat we need, Lord you provide.
You care for us, Tiny birds here you care for, No bird falls down, without your will 0 Father, You've numbered all the hairs we have.
I sorrow not, For now I know the Lord God, He cares for me; He thinks of me and loves me, My footsteps, perfectly He guides.
If you keep me, I shall have all I need here, All that I need, is you my Lord, Christ Jesus, Lord you are mine for evermore.
My Lord and God, Your Name is wonderful, Lord I'll praise you Lord, I'll worship you forever, I'll glorify and honor you.

name: PHB 51
verses: None compares with  you, Dear Lord Jesus Christ. You are Life and Joy  and Savior,You are source of all  my being, Son of God, my Lord, None compares with  you.
Full life you gave me, You came, rescued me. You are God of my  salvation,By your death, you  gave me new life. By the Blood you shed, You restored my soul.
Light of God you are, Christ, eternal Lord. You gave up your life to save us, You became flesh like all humans. When God’s time had come, Light of God appeared.
Christ, victorious God, You are Savior Lord. You took sin away to save us, Lord, you conquered death and  Satan. From this sacrifice, We have all been blessed
When I leave this earth, Grant me peace in death. Bring me to be with you Jesus, Clothe me in your righteousness,  God. Grant that I might be, At your right side, Lord!

name: PHB 52
verses: Our gracious God, is full  of mercy, Who shall comprehend  such great love? Let not your heartbe hardened, sinner, Come to Him, give Him  thanks for love. His love is full and free for  us all,

Should I have no regard  for Jesus? Should I not worship  Christ the Lord? He calls me always,I must listen, And follow Him, walk in  His ways. His Word I  have now hid in my  heart,His Word is sure, is truth  indeed. His Word shows me to love  God always, Love others as, I love myself.

Thy gracious works are all  before me, I shall not forget all your  works. Fill me and blessme with your Love, Lord, That I might please you,  love you Lord. In trouble and in suffering  in life,Remind me of your love for  me, And when I breathe my last  on this earth, Remind me of your love for  me.

name: PHB 53
verses: Mountains may be moved  and vanish, But God’s grace forever  stands, God has spoken and has  promised,Everlasting is His Word. Covenant God abiding, Nothing can our faith  destroy.

In God’s Word, we have  great promise, In this word we trust only In this Word we have  great comfort,We are blessed with such  great peace. All of flesh and blood shall  perish, But God’s grace forever  stands.

We are strengthened by  God’s promise, Fear and mourning cease in  Christ, For He gives us peace  eternal,Peace transcending all  man’s thoughts. When you always trust in  God’s, You shall fear no evil foe.
When your sins distress, alarm you, Know His Word assures of cleansing, By His Word, you are forgiven, Christ forgives you all your sins. Great the mercy of Christ Jesus, No damnation you must dread.

Have great confidence in God’s Word, Rock on which your faith must rest, This shall be the great assurance, Death’s great fright you’ll overcome. Death shall be a gate to heaven, Everlasting peace shall have.

name: PHB 57
verses: Jehovah, Lord our God, Lord of all life, and  Spirit. You are eternal, You fill  the whole creation.You are the same always. You are the source of  life, All things shall pass  away. Lord you are evermore.

Thy works, O Lord, we see, You planned from eternity. Nothing is hid from you, You know our thoughts  and hearts, Lord.You know our days and  life, You know our struggles  here, Our days are numbered, You have them in your  Book.

Your knowledge is so vast, Surpassing what we know  here. With knowledge you made  all, The earth and heav’ns  created.Knowledge most  wonderful, We now find in the plan, The plan to save  mankind, The plan we see in

You are most selfless God, And you are God of all  peace. Nothing you need in life, All that you have you gave  us.Provider God you are, You give us all we need, All those that trust in  you, Testify of your power.

We are before you Lord, In great humility, bow. Give us the grace to  come, With thanks in heart and  spirit.With open hearts we come, Search Lord our hearts to  see, What is not right in them, Cleanse our hearts, make  them pure.

name: PHB 59
verses: O Lord, Almighty God Majestic is Thy Name  Lord. By Word you did  create,You made the  earth and heaven. You spoke and all  things came,At your command they  came. Your power sustains  them all, Your mercy is so great.

You are Almighty  God, The heav’ns,  declare your glory.Thy wondrous works  are seen, All things reveal your  glory. In great humility,I sing your praise with  thanks. Salvation that I have, Comes from you  Mighty God!

When I look at the  heav’ns, The moon and  stars established.The sun and seas and  all, And all you have  created. I marvel, and I ask,What is man that you  made? So much you care for  him, You love him more than  all.

You care for us your  sheep, Food, raiment all you gave  us. You care so much for us,You crowned us  with your glory. My inward parts  you knew,Before my birth,you  knew. You knew me all too well, How wonderful Thy  works.

You blessed me  with so much, And troubles you  permitted.In Thy book is  written, All days you did  assign me. In life you sustain me,You bear me gently  through. You seek repentant  hearts, Your mercy is so great.

To seek you, is true life, To follow you is  blessing. In you we have great  peace,I shall be near you  always. When evil men tempt  me, To follow in their ways,Save me from  such broad way, That leads to  death, O Lord.

When I have you O,  Lord, I shall leave all and  follow. If I am yours,O Lord,What pleasure  shall I seek here? Lord you have  asked of me,My heart and all my  being, Help me to keep to you, You are my Lord and  God.

name: PHB 60
verses: Great is the Lord, All creatures do  acknowledge. Glorious is He, Let all  now praise,Jehovah Lord. All creatures sing  together, The Lord is great.  X2
Great is the Lord, In wisdom He made  all things. He made the heav’ns,How vast His works in  heav’n above. Great King we have,  with Wisdom, The Lord is great. X2
Great is the Lord, See how He makes  the morning, And makes the night,All suited for life on this  earth. All things are free and  wondrous, The Lord is great. X2
To Him alone, All praise and  thanks be given. All earth must sing,All nations come, join  the chorus. We all must say  together, The Lord is great. X2

name: PHB 61
verses: Let us sing a song of  blessing, Let us thank the Lord  today. For His love is  never-ceasing, And His kindness onour way; With His mercy and  protection, He is with His children still. And with all that do His  will,In this world of  imperfection; Everything in this world  ends, But God’s love for ever  stands

As an eagle spreads its  feathers, Covering its little ones; So the arm of God is ever, Stretched abovevHis trusting sons; He knew us from the  beginning, He will keep us  till at last. When this earthly life is  past,We shall praise Him, gladly  singing; Everything in this world  ends, But God’s love for ever  stands

He sent His dear Son to  save us, Save us from sin and from  hell. Through His blood, He  dearly gave us,Freedom from the devil’s  spell; O how generous is His  mercy, How can any  human mind, Through its wisdom ever  find,All the depths of God’s  great mercy, Everything in this world  ends, But God’s love for ever  stands

By His Spirit, He will guide  us, By His Word, He leads us  on. Let the world with scorn  deride us,We belong to His dear  Son. He will fill our hearts  with courage, And with faith and  heav’nly light,He will overcome all fright, Even death and hell’s  disparage. Everything in this world  ends, But God’s love for ever  stands

By the love of God His  Father, Jesus keeps my soul  from harm, When the flesh is weak  and troubled,I repair to Him for help. When I feel so weak and  helpless, When all hope  is gone away. Then the Lord comes  close to me,Fresh hope and life I have  from Him. Everything in this world  ends, But God’s love for ever  stands.

When I sleep the Lord is  with me, Peaceful rest I have in  Him. In the morning when I  wake up,I declare His gracious  care. If the Lord shall not  protect me, Human watch  is all in vain, I shall quickly perish here,Suffer danger and  destruction. Everything in this world  ends, But God’s love for ever  stands.

Love of God I know is  lasting, Love eternal is God’s Love. Therefore I shall look to  Jesus, Look to FatherGod in Heav’n. Hear my humble cry  before you, Grant me  grace to live for you, Help me yield this heart  to you,Hold you closely and be  with you. When I end the journey  her, I shall love you,  evermore!

name: PHB 62
verses: In worship we have  Highest joy, God’s grace much  abounds here . Great priceless treasures  we have found,All hope in God the  Father. They shall find rich  blessings Him, They shall have great  freedom in Him. X2

The One who cares for  me and feeds, Who prospers the work I  do, He is the Lord in all my  life.He who shows me the way  to life, He leads me through the  dangerous ways, My helper He will always  be. x2

Some toil so hard for vain  things here, They earthly things they  seek for. They spend much time for  all vain things.I must seek what is  precious. True life and true pleasure  I’ll seek, Seek that which lasts  forever more. X2
A living hope great  pleasure gives, Father, grant me this hope  now. Bless me with life eternal  Lord,My soul, my flesh and  spirit; I seek now to glorify God, I commit all to His own  care. X2

In His love He knows my  life time, He has planned all things  for me, In His own time all things  shall be.I shall leave all things to  Christ, For He knows all the best  for me, His will be done for me in  life. x2

So long as I live here on  earth, I’ll yield to His ordaining. My trust is in Christ  Jesus now.None else I trust in this life. What is of worth is God’s  will done, For all His promises shall  stand. X2

name: PHB 63
verses: The Church of Christ, come  now to sing, Come with much pleasure  and joy. Sing joyful songs together  now,Sing of the blessings from  the Lord, His wondrous works  declare to all, Sing of pleasant works  here.

I was once in the devil’s  camp, I had no hope of life, dead. I struggled, wrestled in my  sin, From birth I suffered distress.In sin I lived in bondage  here, No good thing dwelt in me  to do, Sin was my master and  lord.

My wretched state did move  your heart, You had compassion for me: You remembered your mercy  Lord, And you resolved to saveThe fullness of your heart  you poured, You did what was  impossible. You gave your heart to a  wretch.

The Father sent His only  Son, At the right time He did send. He sent His own begotten  Son, That He might save us fromHe sent Him to take sin  away, And conquer death by His,  own Death, He came that we may have  life.

Take hold of life in Jesus  Christ, In Him you have the  victory. His promises are true and  sure,He will be with you, always. You are mine Lord, I am  yours, Help me to be in you always, Nothing separates me from  you.

What I am Lord and have  become, Is from You Christ, it is Your  gift. Come Kingdom of our God,  come now,Establish glory of God. Beloved friend, be careful  here, That you may not be led  astray, Be in Christ Jesus ever.

name: PHB 64
verses: Eternal Light! Eternal  Light! How pure the soul must  be When, placed within Thysearching sight, It shrinks not, but with  calm delight Can live, and look on  Thee!
The spirits that surround  Thy throne May bear the burning  bliss; But that is surely theirs  alone,Since they have  never, never known A fallen world like  this.
O how shall I, whose  native sphere Is dark, whose mind  is dim,Before the Ineffable  appear, And on my naked spirit  bear That uncreated beam?
There is a way  for man to rise To that sublime  abode:An offering and a  sacrifice, A Holy Spirit’s energies, An Advocate with God.
These, these  prepare us for the  sight Of holiness above;The sons of ignorance  and night, May dwell in the eternal  Light, Through the eternal Love.

name: PHB 65
verses: Life is empty, without Jesus, Life is poor without the  Lord. We acknowledge all our  struggles,Lord of mercy, see our plight. Come to us, in Thy compassion, Come and save us wretched  people.
We are nothing, dear Lord  Jesus, All is dark around us here. And we struggle with the  devil,Deadly venom he sends out. All our life is poisoned by  him, We are doomed, without  your help Lord.
Come and guide us in your  Way, Lord, In this only we have hope. Traps of evil are about us,Satan’s net is over us. Life is filled with deceit and  fear, Suffering is our lot on this  earth.

We are cast down, dear Lord  Jesus, No hope is there for the sick. Our best strength is weak and  nothing,Life is vain here in this earth, We are humans frail and so  weak, We lack strength to live for you  Lord.

Come now Lord, we pray  you Jesus, Come as light and  strengthen us. Open Lord our eyes and  hearts now,Grant us grace to see your  love. Sun of righteousness shine  on us, Fill our hearts with peace  from you Lord.

Rebuke Satan, dear Lord Jesus, Come destroy his works in us. Come our Bridegroom, come  soon Jesus,Let your glory fill our lives. Give us taste of life in  heaven, Then all pain shall cease in  this life

Fill us with thy gracious  Spirit, Fill us with your power Oh  Lord. Fill our lives with peace from  you Lord,Peace to follow you in love. Gracious Lord equip your  servants, That we may live, as would  please you.

In this Lord, we’ll offer  praises, Praise you from our hearts  and being. We shall come before you  Jesus,Come with joy to worship  you. Let this whole earth sing  your praises, Laud and honor Jesus ever.

name: PHB 66
verses: Jesus Christ is Lord  of all life, Priceless treasure,  Jesus is.He came down from  God to save us, Save us from death  in our sin.
For our sake, Christ  took frail flesh here, He became poor like  all men.He became a Lamb  from God now, Death eternal, saved  us from.
For our sin Christ  suffered anguish, Bore the wages of  our sin.Bore the curse we  all deserve now, Christ has saved  His own from death.
Jesus Christ  suffered for sinners, Heav’nly joy from  Him we have.By His death and  resurrection, We now have  eternal life.

name: PHB 67
verses: There is only ‘One’,  worthy, One we’ll praise and  give honor. One before whom, all  must bow,Lay before Him  prostrate here, Jesus, God who  came in flesh. X2
There is ‘One’, who bore  the load, Burden of the world He  bore. One who paid sin’s debt  for all,Bore the world’s  sin to the grave. Jesus, One was  crucified. X2
There is ‘One’,  who gave us light, Light to see in  this dark world.Light from God to give us  hope, We behold this light of  God, Jesus, who rose from the  dead. X2
Who atoned for all  our sin? Sacrificed His life for  sin? He must be High Priest  for all,For all sinners here  on earth, Jesus, ‘One’, who  reigns in heav’n.  X2.
There is ‘one’ , who is  righteous. One whose glory fills the  world. This ‘one’ beckons all on  earth.Seeks to gather now  His bride. Jesus, He will come  again X2

name: PHB 68
verses: Much decay is all around  us, So much ruin in creation. God made us so beautiful  beings, Sin has come to  ruin us all.
Earth is full of pain and  trouble, Hatred, envy, strife, we see. Flesh is strong, has  overcome us, We are full of lust and greed.
Sin of Adam, our first  father, Has corrupted humankind. Wages for our sin against  God, Death eternal is our due.
Who can save us from such  trouble? Who can save us once for  all? Who can pay the wages of  sin? Who can bear the  curse for us?
Son of God, our Lord, Christ  Jesus, He who comes from God in  heav’n; He has died the death of  sinners, He paid all the wages due.
Dear Lord Jesus, Lord of  mercy, Look upon our misery. Save us from this world so  evil, Grant us life eternal now.

name: PHB 69
verses: I know of a dear Friend, A friend from God above, Jesus the Christ, God’s  dear Son He came down from,  above. X2
God loved this world so  much He gave His only Son. Christ Jesus left His  glory, He came to die for us. X2
God sacrificed Jesus, He gave Him for our sin. So come to Him my  brother Give all your heart to  Him. X2
If you love Christ Jesus, To whom none can  compare. Then come with me to  Jesus, He cares so much for you.  X2
He came for salvation, For sinful man He came. With His own Blood He  bought us, What priceless gift from  God. X2
There’s no one like Jesus, Who loves you dearly,  friend. So come to Him my brother, Come now to Christ the  Lord. X2

name: PHB 70
verses: What shall I do, my  God to love, My loving God to  praise! The lengthand breadth, and  height to prove And depth of  sovereign grace?
Thy sovereign  grace to all  extend, Immense and  unconfined;From age to age  it never ends, It reaches all  mankind.
Throughout the  world its breadth  is known, Wide as infinity,So wide it never  passed by one; Or it had passed  by me.
My trespass was  grown up to Heav’n; But far above the  skies,In Christ  abundantly  forgiv’n, I see Thy mercies  rise!
The depth of  all-redeeming  love, WhatO may I to the  utmost prove The gift  unspeakable!
Deeper than hell, it  plucked me  thence; Deeper than inbred  sin:Jesus’ love my  heart shall cleanse, When Jesus enters  in.
Come quickly,  then, my Lord, and  take Possession of Thine  own;My longing heart  vouchsafe to make Thine everlasting  throne.
Assert Thy claim,  receive Thy right, Come quickly  from above,And sink me to  perfection’s height, The depth of  humble love.

name: PHB 71
verses: Father, Whose  everlasting love Thy only Son for  sinners gave,Whose grace to  all did freely  move, And sent Him  down the world to
Help us Thy mercy to  extol, Immense, unfathomed,  unconfined;To praise the Lamb  who died for all, The general Savior  of mankind.
Thy  undistinguishin  g regard Was cast onFor all Thou hast  in Christ prepared Sufficient,  sovereign, saving  grace
The world He  suffered to redeem; For all He hath the  atonement made;For those that will  not come to Him The ransom of His  life was paid.
Why then, Thou  universal Love, Should any of Thy  grace despair?To all, to all, Thy  bowels move, But straitened in  our own we are.
Arise, O God,  maintain Thy  cause! The fullness of the  Gentiles call;Lift up the  standard of Thy  cross, And all shall own  Thou diedst for all.

name: PHB 72
verses: Praise to the Holiest in the  height, And in the depth be praise; In all His words most  wonderful, Most sure in all His ways.
O loving wisdom of our  God! When all was sin and  shame, A second Adam to the fight And to the rescue came.
O wisest love! that flesh and  blood, Which did in Adam fail, Should strive afresh against  the foe, Should strive and should  prevail.
And that a higher gift than  grace Should flesh and blood  refine, God’s Presence and His very  Self, And Essence all divine.
O generous love! that  He, who smote, In Man for man the foe, The double agony in Man For man should undergo.
And in the garden secretly, And on the Cross on high, Should teach His brethren,  and inspire To suffer and to die.
Praise to the Holiest in the  height, And in the depth be praise; In all His words most  wonderful, Most sure in all His ways.

name: PHB 73
verses: Not what my hands have  done Can save my guilty soul; Not what my toiling  flesh has borne Can make my spirit
Not what I feel or do Can give me peace with  God; Not all my prayers and  sighs and tears Can bear my awful load.
Thy work alone, O  Christ, Can ease this weight  of sin; Thy blood alone, O  Lamb of God,
Thy love to me, O God, Not mine, O Lord to  thee, Can rid me of this dark  unrest And set my spirit free.
Thy grace alone, O  God, To me can pardon  speak; Thy pow'r alone, O  Son of God,
I bless the Christ of  God; I rest on love divine; And with unfalt'ring lip  and heart I call this Saviour mine.

name: PHB 74
verses: In the fall of Adam in  sin, All mankind was  corrupted. All mankind became  so sinful,Only God, from sin  could save us, From the wages of sin  save. And the curse on earth  for sinning,

Eve became deceived  by Satan, She fell in the evil trap. She forsook, the Lord  her maker, And she passed sin on And all died for sin  committed, But God sent His only  Son, He became man, our sin  He bore,

Sinful nature, Adam had  then, We all shared Adam’s  nature. By the work of Savior  Jesus, As we all died in Adam’s  sin, Death eternal we all faced. But through Christ, God’s  only Son’s death, Children of God we are

While yet sinners and  without hope, God gave Christ as gift to  us. On the Cross, Christ died  for sinners, He ascended up to  Heaven, And He sat on God’s  Right Hand. If we have faith in Christ  Jesus,

Jesus is the Way to  Heaven, He is life and truth and  grace. God’s Word Jesus spoke  and taught us. He Himself is that Word He atoned for sin for  all men. He reconciled us to  God. All that, come to Him  believing.

Cursed is he, who lacks  God’s glory, Cursed is he, without  God’s grace. Curse is dealt with in  Christ Jesus, If we seek another  savior, We shall die without a  hope. Satan blinds us and  deceives us,

Those with faith in  Christ as Savior, And do trust in Jesus  Christ. They shall not have any  worries, In this world they’ll  suffer evil, But they’ll not suffer the  hell. They shall be with  Christ in Heaven,

With my heart I’ll plead  with Jesus, Rich blessings I’ll seek  from Him. Let His Word dwell  richly in me, That I might not sin  against you, For in you I’m glorified. Those that trust you and  believe you, They shall never suffer

Lord your Word is lamp  that guides me, It shines brightly in the  dark. The Word shows me  way to follow, This Word leads me to  the Father, Home above, the Word  leads me. In the Word, we all have  blessings,

name: PHB 75
verses: "There is no God", says the  foolish, From their blindness they say  such. They are all corrupt that say  this, Abominable they are. The Lord looks down from  the heavens, The Lord sees all people  here. He looks for any that seek  Him, He looks for a wise man here.

All have sinned and there is  no one, No one seeks after the Lord. There is no one who is  righteous, None that does what pleases  God. None has thought to seek  the Father, None has also seen the Lord. None has come to seek  forgiveness, That he may be saved from  sin.

Zion’s God, the God of  mercy, Shower your mercy on us. Save our souls from sin,  dear Father, For our sin is multitude. Jesus Christ your Son shed  His Blood, Poured His Blood for all  sinners, That we may be saved by His  Blood, Hear us Lord, to you we pray.

name: PHB 76
verses: Love Divine, O love so Holy, Love that came from heav’n  to earth; In great love, you came as  servant, For our sin, you died for us.
With great glory,  you descended, From your Throne in  heav’n, you came. Teach us Lord to  show your glory, Give us grace to  bear much fruit.
Come you people,  come all nations, Come together,  sing God’s praise. Soon we shall all be  in Heaven, There we’ll praise  Him evermore.

name: PHB 77
verses: Lord our God, Lord our God, Look upon us wretched ones. We are helpless, bound in sin  Lord, We are filled with lust of  flesh,We are weak and have no  strength Lord, Merciful Lord be to us your  own, Lord our God, Lord our God, Look upon us wretched ones.

Gracious God, gracious  God, You are God of love we  know. To you Lord we give all  praises, You didst come to save us    Jesus Christ your Son you  gave us, In Him we all have salvation  now. Gracious God, gracious God, You are God of love we  know.

name: PHB 78
verses: Day shall come, day shall  come, God shall burn this earth with  fire. As of old the waters covered, All the earth, destroyed all  life,So the day shall come upon  us, This earth shall be up in  smoke that day. Day shall come, day shall  come, God shall burn this earth with  fire.

My Lord God, my Lord God, Grant me Lord a Saint to be. That when you shall burn  this planet, I shall hide in you my God, Save me as the Ark of Noah Save me from destruction of  the earth. My Lord God, my Lord God Grant me Lord a Saint to be.

name: PHB 79
verses: Zion’s daughter, O be glad, And rejoice, Jerusalem! Lo! Thy King doth come to  thee: Lo! He comes, the  Prince of Peace! Zion’s daughter, O be glad, And rejoice, Jerusalem.

name: PHB 80
verses: Lift up your heads, ye  mighty gates, Behold the King of glory  waits; The King of kings is  drawing near, Life and salvation doth  He bring, Wherefore rejoice and  gladly sing: We praise Thee, Father,  now!
The Lord is just, a  Helper tried, Mercy is ever at His  side, His kingly crown is  holiness, The end of all our woe  He brings; Wherefore the earth is  glad and sings: We praise Thee, Savior,  now,

Oh blest the land, the city  blest, Where Christ the Ruler is  confessed! Oh happy hearts and  happy homes, The cloudless Sun of  joy He is, Who bringeth pure  delight and bliss: O Comforter divine, What boundless grace

Fling wide the portals of  your heart, Make it a temple set apart From earthly use for  Heaven’s employ, Adorned with prayer and  love and joy;   So shall your  Sovereign enter in, And new and nobler  life begin: To Thee, O God, be  praise,
Redeemer, come! I  open wide My heart to Thee here,  Lord, abide! Let me Thy inner  presence feel, Thy Holy Spirit guide  us on Until our glorious goal  is won! Eternal praise and  fame,

name: PHB 81
verses: Come all you people come  now, Prepare your hearts for God. Trespassers, God will  forgive, Wonderful Savior comes.The glory of the Lord, The Light that God did  promise, Has come and now dwells  with us, We, welcome Jesus Christ.

Righteous paths come and  seek now, Prepare to welcome Him. Make straight the crooked  paths then, Forsake the life of wrong.For He who comes from  High, Immanuel God hates sin. Has come to save us  sinners, Prepare your heart for Him.

The broken, contrite heart  seek, The Lord shall enter here. Prideful, boastful life God  hates, Disgrace shall come to such.In hearts with no deceit, The heart that seeks the  Lord’s truth, A heart prepared for Jesus, He’ll come and enter there.
